gen:link.msg:message: `InvestmentPropertiesOnBehalfOfPensionFund` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_InvestmentPropertiesOnBehalfOfPensionFund')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_InvestmentPropertiesOnBehalfOfPensionFund return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesOnBehalfOfPensionFundDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesOnBehalfOfPensionFundDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesOnBehalfOfPensionFundCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedInvestmentsOnBehalfOfPensionFundBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentPropertiesOnBehalfOfPensionFundCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
